title: A few 19th century cards for sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: A few 19th century cards for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed Hans
1) N86 Dukes Perilous Occupations baseball theme card. Minor soiling, otherwise ex/mt-$SOLD delivered.

2)N284 Buchner Monte Ward. SGC authentic, likely cut from a poster-$SOLD delivered.

3)Tobin color litho of Tim Keefe. PSA6 (MK). The ridiculous qualifier is from he period pharmacists stamp on the reverse. Gorgeous example of this hall of fame hurler-$715.00 delivered.

First come, first served. Please email or call to confirm. Check or money order only. Please send to Ed Hans P.O. Box 307 Buffalo, N.Y. 14207. (716) 876-6359-Evenings and weekends are best, but call anytime and leave a message. Or email at edhans@monkberry.com. Thanks for looking.


[IMG]http://www.thecybersource.com/~edhans/tobintim.jpg[/IMG]
